com.freshbourne.multimap.btree
Interface DataPage

All Superinterfaces:
Page
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicDataPage
public interface DataPage
extends Page

Pages implementing this interface use the provided buffer to store data. add, get and remove use byte arrays instead of ByteBuffer since they usually come from serializations which usually create a new byte array.

Method Summary

          adds some bytes to the underlying body.
